meanings.definition: Of or relating to the stratosphere.
meanings.sent1: The airplane flew at a stratospheric altitude, close to space.
meanings.sent2: The weather balloon reached a stratospheric height before bursting.
meanings.sent3: The bird's dream of flying in the stratospheric layer made the other birds jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her aspirations were as stratospheric as the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The view from the stratospheric vantage point was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Reaching or existing at a very high or elevated level.
meanings.sent1: The skyscraper had a stratospheric height compared to the surrounding buildings.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's performance reached a stratospheric level, breaking all records.
meanings.sent3: The price of the limited edition sneakers was stratospheric, but he bought them anyway.
meanings.sent4: Her success soared to stratospheric heights after years of hard work.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the stadium was at a stratospheric level during the final match.
